amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by $19,200,000,000 the total amount of appropriations for this bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $19,200,000,000 the total amount of appropriations for this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 326 (Roll no. 488).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
